channel.title: Clay Shirky on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Clay Shirky on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Read this, then stop reading.
item.description: I'm noticing a curious pattern in some posts that I read from around the net that cause me to come to a dead stop in what I'm doing and leave the system I'm looking at. Paul Jones's #noemail crusade makes me close my Gmail browser tab.  Even a quick glimpse of Clay Shirky talking about information overload makes me want to hit the "mark all as read" button in Google Reader. When I read xkcd's Let Go cartoon it's time to turn off the computer.
